    Across our campuses in Spain we offer a wide-ranging portfolio of on-campus programmes that will appeal to all profiles. Our undergraduate and postgraduate degrees, as well as other courses, cover numerous areas including Communications, Health and Medicine, Engineering, Sport Science and more. Make the most of our top-class facilities including a simulated hospital, television and radio studio and sports centre.

    Universidad Europea has been offering high-quality further education programmes for more than 25 years. As a leading private university in Spain, we have a large portfolio of degrees, postgraduate programs, doctorates, courses and more. Our success is built on the idea of experiential learning, meaning that all our students gain practical experience and work on real case studies throughout their time with us. This experience is further enhanced thanks to agreements we have with leading companies and organisations in Spain and abroad to carry out internships and work placements. Take a look at our programme offer and get in touch today to start building your future.
